learndown v1.0.4

Reference

All functions

checker_ack_learnr()

A default checker that just acknowledges submission

config() encrypt() decrypt()

Configure the R environment for the course (including database information)

diagnose_login()

Insert code in an R Markdown document to diagnose personal data information (login, contextual data, ...)

h5p()

Insert H5P content in the document

launch_shiny()

Launch Shiny application by clicking on its screenshot.

learndownShiny() learndownShinyVersion() submitAnswerButton() quitButton() submitQuitButtons()

Create and manage learndown Shiny applications

learndown_init()

Initialize learndown features in an R Markdown document

read_shinylogs()

Read shinylogs log data and format them in a data.frame

record_learnr() user_name() user_email()

Record results of learnr exercises in a MongoDB database

record_shiny()

Record Shiny events in a MongoDB database

run()

Run learndown learnr tutorials from a package

send_mail_learnr()

Send your learnr submissions by email

trackEvents() trackSubmit() trackQuit()

Track events, the submit or the quit buttons

webshot_shiny()

Create the screenshot image of a Shiny application with a click icon

We build software for reproducible research with R
